oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surrender orders for Gen. Richard Tayolr signed by Gen. Edward Canby
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is an original duplicate order of surrender provided to Gen. Richard Taylor, CSA by Gen. Edward Canby, USA. The order provides details on the process by which the Confederate Army under Taylor are to be paroled, the disposition of their artillery, firearms, and ammunition. General Richard Taylor's army, concentrated around Mobile, and southern Mississippi, was the last Confederate Army to surrender east of the Mississippi River.
